message.body: Hey mike! How are you?
I'm well. I just got home. We had a meeting after work. How have you been?
I've been good!!! I'm on the train from boston to ny. So I thought I'd say hi!
Are you going to New York home or New York City?
Ny home to get ready for the thing me and Ingrid are doing Chelsea
Do u have any adventures planned?
For the summer?
Nothing definite. My friend Ben incited me to hop trains to Florida with him in August. As long as be doesn't get his wife pregnant before then.
I also really want to save up enough money to go to Europe. My friend Felix invited me to stay with him in hamburg.
You?
Oh wow. Hamburg!!! Be careful hopping trains.
Hopping trains seems scary
Well I'm Going to Maine for a week. Going to see if I can borrow someone's apt in ny for a little so I can hang out in ny.
I wanna visit my grandpa in Cali
I just want to go to the beach
What are you going to do in Maine?
Paint and go to the beach with Wendy
Painting in Maine sounds awesome. You should eat lots of blueberries when you're there.
I love blueberries.
Is that where they come from?
Yep. And I think summer is when they are born too.
